CustomField.formula: ( Last_FY_Q3_HC__c + Last_FY_Q3_SC__c + Last_FY_Q3_PSC__c + X2_FY_Ago_Q3_HC__c + X2_FY_Ago_Q3_SC__c + X2_FY_Ago_Q3_PSC__c + X3_FY_Ago_Q3_HC__c + X3_FY_Ago_Q3_SC__c + X3_FY_Ago_Q3_PSC__c ) / 3
CustomField.inlineHelpText: average of Q3 total combined credits last 3 FYs based on NPSP roll-ups, for strategic plan metrics
CustomField.label: Q3 Avg Last 3 FY
